summary.para: Launches a Report Wizard, and after its steps are completed sends the obtained information to the server, where a new report based on these settings is created.

member.value: true to enable border-related options in the Report Designer; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.ReportDesigner.ReportDesignerViewModel.CanEditBorderSides

summary.para: Defines whether or not it is possible to modify individual border side properties for a control.

member.value: true to enable individual border side editors in the Report Designer; otherwise false.

summary.para: Provides functionality for the Silverlight Report Designer.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.ReportDesigner.ReportDesigner.AutoStartDesign

member.value: true to automatically start the design session; otherwise false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
For internal use.
Initializes a Silverlight Report Designer.
